title: 2002 Trailmobile 53’ Dry Van Trailer
item_description:
2002 Trailmobile 53’ Dry Van Trailer

Removal Note: This trailer can be removed on Monday, August 25th, 2025 through Friday, August 29th, 2025 from 9:00 AM to 3:30 PM.

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2002
  • Make: Trailmobile
  • VIN: 1PT01JAH926000537
  • License: 23TLR6115A
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 65,000

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 53'
  • Overall Width: 8'
  • Overall Height: 14'

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Air Ride
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Number of Wheels: 8
  • Tire Size: 295/75R22.5
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note:

  • All Trailers Titled in Maine - Buyer will receive a Maine Title, Maine Bill of Sale, and Maine Affidavit of Repossession
  • All Registration Expiration Dates are Unknown, bid accordingly
  • For trailers with CA plates, no CA title will be provided. Maine title only. No Maine plates will be provided by the Seller/Lien holder on those trailers.
  • All paperwork will be mailed to the buyers approximately 2 weeks after pickup, once all forms have been signed by the lien holder. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of necessary inspections, registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees (including back fees) due to the Maine BMV.
